column4: Hi, I have an Intel manufactured integrated WLAN card, I'm having problems to connect to wireless networks... can anyone help me?
I'm on a laptop by the way if it's any use
time to do some googling :P see if other disrtos/people with same laptop have gotten it working.
nothing works as in "their suggestions" dont work.. or some parts of it dont work... or....... cant find any info at all?
